minecraft:lore: {"color":"gray","italic":false,"text":"[","extra":[{"color":"dark_green","bold":false,"italic":false,"keybind":"key.use"},{"color":"gray","italic":false,"text":"] on a Gravemite summon to evolve it into a Gravemite Gnawer."}]}
{"color":"#9620b6","italic":false,"text":"[ SKILL ] ","extra":[{"color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false,"text":"This entity gains the ability to devour corpses."}]}
{"color":"#9620b6","italic":false,"text":"[ SKILL ] ","extra":[{"color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false,"text":"While devouring corpses, heal nearby allies every second."}]}
{"color":"#b62020","italic":false,"text":"[ ON-DEATH ] ","extra":[{"color":"gray","bold":false,"italic":false,"text":"Massively heal allies in a large radius."}]}
{"color":"gray","italic":false,"text":"Existing weapons and armors will be carried over."}
